product_name: rubber chicken purse - the "hen bag" handbag
review_text: Ordered this as a "fun" bag as this is the Year of the Rooster 2017. It is large enough to hold a wallet, an umbrella, a pocket camera, a handphone, a fat toiletry pouch that holds all my "girl items". My only dislike is the length/size of the zip opening on top of the bag - it is 6 inches (15cm). To put a regular size ladies wallet or an umbrella inside the bag, I had to slip the item in sideways (not length-wise). I think it will be hard to have to maneuver an item to it's shorter side inside the bag just to take it out of the bag. And of course if you have "big" hands, it will be a struggle to get your hand even inside the bag. Even with my hands (XS Gloves American-Size), it was not easy for me. And the straps are not long enough to carry the bag on my shoulder.

product_name: rubber chicken purse - the "hen bag" handbag
review_text: The chicken purse is made of vinyl and is not very made for anyone wanting a real purse. This bag is very large and is for some one that wants a bit of whimsy. It is cute and was bought for an elderly person who is crazy about chickens. She LOVED IT!

product_name: rubber chicken purse - the "hen bag" handbag
review_text: I love my chickens...and I really do like the concept of this purse. It is made of rubber, and therefore would be a great purse for rainy weather. When the purse arrived, it had been folded for shipping (I can understand that), However, I have to keep it fairly loaded so it doesn't look like a folded chicken. I love carrying it and always get compliments (or at least giggles), but I have had to quit carrying it since the zipper is so short and it is a constant struggle to get my wallet in and out through the zippered opening. When I do manage to get the wallet through the top it always seems to hang on the pocket inside the purse and I have to struggle to get it past that obstacle too. I am really disappointed that the inconvenience is greater than the pleasure of carrying it since I really do like the bag. I think it would have held up well if I had been able to use it more often. But alas, I guess it was not meant to be! On the plus side, once you are able to fit your items into the bag it holds quite a bit of necessary things that women like to carry around with them. Another plus for this bag is that if you happen to be of child bearing age and also happen to have a small person you are carrying around with you...I'm sure a couple of bottles would fit in here nicely along with a diaper or two. And if a bottle happened to leak...hey, no problem. Rubber chicken will protect liquids from bleeding through and damaging anything the purse happens to be sitting on. You would have to be careful with the diaper suggestion though. I think the zipper would probably tear the plastic around the diaper.

product_name: rubber chicken purse - the "hen bag" handbag
review_text: I saw a girl at the gym with this bag and I had to have one. The zipper was really small and I could not easily put anything inside it without intricate, time-consuming maneuvering. It was a conversation starter and the kids loved it. I took it to a farm school and the real chicken there had issues with it and tried to attack it. When I first unpacked it, I was thrown off by the smell, and I hoped that in time, it would diminish. No. It didn't. It's like a dead body was dipped in petroleum and glued to a giant moth ball. The fumes are so intense it makes your nose burn and your contact lenses bend inside out. You will weep for any kind of relief. I filled the entire purse with bounce sheets and wrapped it in wax paper and stuck it in the freezer for a week to see if the smell would fade away. No such luck. All my frozen food smells like it's been shoved up the tail pipe of a big rig. I had to throw everything out. I put baby powder in it and wrapped it in bubble wrap and put it outside for a week and then poured baking soda in the purse to see if that would help. No. It didn't. Although I really loved the concept and whimsy of the purse, I finally gave up the dream and donated it to Goodwill by dumping it in an overnight depository. At this time I must apologize to the needy who will discover this petroleum treasure. I mean you no harm. But it's cute, isn't it?

product_name: rubber chicken purse - the "hen bag" handbag
review_header: Cute, hilarious, and not made for long term use. A great gag gift.
review_text: This is a hen bag. It is a great gag gift, but I am sure it will fall apart given a lot of use. Its build quality is not that of a Michael Kors or Tory Burch bag, it is made of thin rubber (or vinyl or something of that ilk) barring the handles, which are rolled canvas. Where these stitch to the rubber is bound to fall apart eventually. That said, it's a hen bag!

product_name: rubber chicken purse - the "hen bag" handbag
review_text: The color is wrong on the pic, the bag is more yellow-orange, and I don't like it. Smells terrible. Hole-zip is really small and it hard put your stuff easily.

product_name: rubber chicken purse - the "hen bag" handbag
review_text: I got this along with a baby chick coin purse to give to my mother as a gift. The quality of this purse is so cheap! I can see them selling this same purse for at most $20 and that's giving it a huge mark up for its novelty value. It probably only cost them like two bucks to make it. The material is thin and due to the way it's been packaged for who knows how long, the purse is lumpy. The area around the tail is folded out at an unflattering angle and one side of the face is lower than the other, along with many other lumps and bumps. The purse deflates easily and probably would only look nice if it was kept quite full. However, since the material is so thin my mother is worried that filling it too much will make it break. The plastic rod in the handles also seem like they may come loose and fall out if you're not careful. I can't believe I paid so much for this! At least my mother was amused by the idea of the purse rather than its execution. Thankfully the coin purse I got her made her really happy as it is something she can use for a long time.

product_name: rubber chicken purse - the "hen bag" handbag
review_header: Bawk Bawk Bawk Cute but not very practical.
review_text: If you or a friend are chicken enthusiasts then this is a fun gift. The purse feels like a rubber chicken which I don't personally love but my friend did. The problem is that the opening on top is too small and makes it difficult to load and unload it. The matching coin purse is cute but has the same problem. I bought an egg key chain to go in the coin purse for my friend and it wouldn't fit in the opening and it is hard to get coins out of it unless you dump it over. I made a box that looked like a chicken nest and put Easter eggs in and around it and gave it to my wonderful boss for Easter. I don't know if she liked it or not. She had seen it in an expensive tourist shop in Savannah, GA and thought it was really fun so I ordered one for her.

product_name: rubber chicken purse - the "hen bag" handbag
review_text: Please come out with a vegetarian version. Think about what it would be like if a dinosaur or a shark carried a purse that looked like you? Wouldn't that make you feel "less than"? Give the chickens a break; it's not enough that we slaughter them by the millions every day, reducing their beautiful bodies into "nuggets." A "henbag"? Really? Perhaps you're too "chicken" to weave your purses out of hemp, or fashion a "rubber tofurkey" handbag.

product_name: rubber chicken purse - the "hen bag" handbag
review_header: Super cute but not meant for me
review_text: It was love at first sight for me and "Hen-ry" and I had to have him. I told my husband about this purse and how much I wanted to have it. My husband, knowing how much of a bag person I am, has been wanting to get me a new purse for months but between a new baby and me not finding a purse I liked had put it off until now. He ordered it the next day for me and of course, was super excited and I tried out Hen-ry for a full day the next day. Cons: I did read the reviews prior to purchasing and a few commented on the small zipper opening and I did study the picture of the opening that has been posted and let me tell you this; I completely under-estimated its size. It is really small. I couldn't appreciate how small it was until I tried to put everything I carry into Hen-ry. I tend to carry a lot of stuff with me (and as my husband will say, "everything including the kitchen sink.") and with the small opening, it makes getting stuff in and out annoying. I use a long wallet similar to Coach F46161 Ashley Signature Sateen Wallet - Khaki/Mahogany and I was barely able to fit it inside horizontally. I also use a coupon organizer similar to C-Line Biodegradable 13-Pocket Expanding File, Coupon Size, 1 File Folder, Color May Vary (48410) and I had a similarly hard time as my wallet putting it in. There is only one small interior pocket and I was hoping to use that as my phone pocket but it didn't fit my iPhone too well. I happen to work in an office environment and thus, I carry my office keys and other work related things along with my personal stuff so having only one pocket hurts me in keeping everything organized. The bag came with a rubbery chemical smell and I knew that the bag would have some sort of a smell with the type of material its made from but it gave me a pounding headache which I didn't expect. Pros: It's an attractive bag and I received many compliments on my first day out with him. I love to make people smile and this bag does just that. The overall interior is quite roomy. If you carry a lot of little items with you or travel light, the small zipper opening shouldn't be an issue for you. With its rubbery exterior, it makes cleaning very easy. Overall: Would I recommend this bag? Yes for the most part but if your anything like me in how I carry everything with me, then no. I will be returning Hen-ry and it greatly saddens me. I really hoped we would work out but it wasn't meant to be.

product_name: rubber chicken purse - the "hen bag" handbag
review_text: This is a cute purse but I'll agree with the other reviewers, the zipper is way too short (which doesn't allow for easy access). The material doesn't seem durable, it's basically the same material as the rubber in a Halloween monster mask. The lining is made of cheap nylon, as are the handles (nylon webbing). But, like I said, for the price...eh.

product_name: rubber chicken purse - the "hen bag" handbag
review_header: the PERFECT ANTI-designer bag ladies and gents
review_text: I first saw this bag when I was shopping at Anthropologie and this lady was carrying it. I *had* to ask where she got it from, cuteness overload. She had worn it so hard there were holes underneath the handles. I have moments where I love having a cheap chicken purse ( I believe I purchased it for about 20 back before this purse exploded on here-- surprised they bumped it to $40... IDK if its worth that price personally), as opposed to a designer bag worth hundred of thousands of dollars-- and this purse makes people smile! This is def a novelty purse, the zipper on the top is kinda small ( the opening in general). Makes it hard to grab aroung in the bag, might be easier to have 2-3pouches in there with all your things in them. That way you could just pull a pouch out, instead of fishing in your bag with one hand.The lining inside is a pale yellow, gets dirty real fast--black would be perfect. Out of all the bags I have, some designer some not, this bag gets me the most compliments, even Nordstrom sales people love it, go figure!

product_name: rubber chicken purse - the "hen bag" handbag
review_header: Spreads the chicken cheer everywhere you go!
review_text: Got this last Christmas as an asked for gift. Yes, it's rubber so it smelled like .....rubber. The smell ( which smelled like new dolls used to smell to me when I got them as child ) was not bad at all, it has since faded. The opening is small, that is the only reason I didn't give it 5 stars, it's hard to get anything out of this purse. I took it out in public as soon as I got it ( even though my sister begged me not to take it ) and the compliments began right away. I have had so many compliments on this purse that I lost count long ago. Not very long into the day, my sister was holding my purse for me and even sat it on her side of the tabletop of the restaurant we lunched at. I am not really interested in carrying the same cookie cutter purse the rest of the world has and this purse has put smiles on so many faces ( yes, one or two of them have been mean ones ) that I really look forward to going places with it. This little purse is a conversation starter and just seems to make people happy seeing it. So, own the look and carry it proudly and just tell them where you got it when they try to buy it from you because I have had a lot of that too.

product_name: rubber chicken purse - the "hen bag" handbag
review_header: This thing is so incredibly stupid looking that I had to have it when I ...
review_text: This thing is so incredibly stupid looking that I had to have it when I saw it. It makes me super happy every time I see it, causes spontaneous conversation, and amusement to everyone else who sees it as well. I have two complaints, first the opening is too fricking small, which is incredibly frustrating, given that it's roomy and so much more should fit in it than does. Second, it would be more aesthetically pleasing if a small amount of material/foam/whatever were in the head so that my poor chicken doesn't look so smooshed. Lastly, a previous reviewer extolled the virtues of the spacious handles, easily accommodating over the shoulder wear, even in a bulky winter cloak. If you purchased as a fat person, expecting it to fit over your arm, alas, it may not. I am still ridiculously happy with my stupid handbag, regardless.

I guess I understand the stress since rubber chicken purses are always in such high demand. But is it going too far? In the end... Purchasing a rubber chicken purse is basically the same as buying conflict diamonds from Africa. The straps are nicely made.

review_text: This is just the greatest purse ever. I've had about 1000 compliments on it already and I've only had it a few weeks. I said "Well, I bet you never thought when you got up to go to work you would have your hand in a rubber chicken" and the security guy just started cracking up. The opening is a bit small, yes, but I have no problems with it and I have big hands and fat sausage fingers. It's a great conversation starter and I just love it more than any other purse I've ever had.

What can I put inside of them? Do they need water? Quarters? DO THEY EVEN HATCH WITH HANDLES? Seriously. product_name: rubber chicken purse - the "hen bag" handbag
review_header: The Joke That Became a Cherished Keepsake
review_text: I saw a photo of this item on my Facebook news feed and thought it was crazy and funny. Then I posted it on my good friend's wall and got a reply of "That's Beautiful" , meant it in a sarcastic way I'm sure. Then for fun I searched on Amazon to see if this purse was offered and there it was! We live a quite a distance apart, occasionally, I like to send her some strange gift in the mail just to let her know I'm thinking of her. This item fit the bill and it was on sale for a good price. So I placed the order and waited. She received and messaged me "Are you kidding me?!" She then posted a photo of herself with the purse on Facebook, her friends, and even her mother, marveled and raved about the purse. Everyone was jealous! I purchased the purse as a joke, but I received an update today that the purse made a debut outing with my friend, I was so surprised, never thought she would use it. I'm sure she didn't think so either, but the novelty must have grew on her. She said 4 people commented on the purse and were very excited! The purse was well worth the money for the laughs that we got, but was even more worth it now that my friend is going to use it! I haven't seen the purse in person so I can't speak of the quality, dimensions, etc. but gift-wise, this is great!

product_name: rubber chicken purse - the "hen bag" handbag
review_header: The Best Purse For a True Character
review_text: Pretty much every good review on this is accurate. The color is more of a light cream with a tinge of yellow, not dark yellow. Has a flat bottom so it sits well. The inside is just an empty large cavern with one pocket that is open (decent for keys and chapstick). I agree with everyone else that the smell is a little strong the first moments you have it, but mine has so far died down a bit. The zipper is also a little on the short side, so if your items inside are jumbled it can be a little harder to find. When I received mine it was a tad flattened, but the purse will naturally puff out after being filled (I'd say a day before the face on mine wasn't flat). Straps are short of course, easiest to carry it on the crook of your arm or in your hand rather than on your shoulder. My straps have this tubing in it that sometimes pops out a little bit, I just push it back in. All in all, amazing purse. I have gotten so many compliments on it. I ended up changing my text noise to that of a chicken cluck just to pull the whole thing together!

A steal for the cost.

product_name: rubber chicken purse - the "hen bag" handbag
review_text: *edit April 1, 2018* The purse doesn’t hold up well if used daily, I typically buy a new one every year as the rubber splits and gets dirty and the bottom Frey’s. UNTIL now. The price used to be $24.99 and now it’s $39.99. NO THANK YOU. Not worth that price, but def worth $24.99. Best. Purse. Ever. I'm an animal lover and this bag is the right amount of cute and kitsch. The Red really pops and the bag compliments every outfit from a dress, nice pants, to jeans. You will love bringing this purse with you everywhere as your buddy, and enjoying all the fun comments people will make! The bag itself holds a lot of items, it has a smaller inside pocket for your keys or chapstick, and the lighter fabric lining helps you find items much easier (which is helpful since the zipper really is pretty short, enough for you to stick your hand in and feel around.)

product_name: rubber chicken purse - the "hen bag" handbag
review_text: I just received it and have only used it once....but here was my experience. I live in Brooklyn, which is "ground zero for cool". My neighborhood in particular, is awesome but is not the coolest (it's being invaded by investment bankers who are not cool at all). :-) I thought for sure that at least 4 or 5 women would stop me on the street asking me where I got the bag. I walked 3 blocks with my lovely rubber chicken purse without a word or glance by anyone (granted, I was holding it close to my body and my coat was the same off-white/yellowish color)...until, that is, a woman whom I suspect spied the lovely chicken, laughed out loud. Now, I couldn't tell if it was a, "OMG, that's the BEST thing ever!" laugh or a, "OMG, what an incredibly ridiculous thing!" laugh. Thinking she was a non-cool banker, I ignored that reaction and continued my walk. I got coffee (no reaction) and then went to my favorite bead/jewelry store (no reaction). Finally, I was so disappointed that my favorite jewelry store employees (and co-jewelry designers!) hadn't said a word, that I blurted, "What do you think about my lovely rubber chicken purse?" The reaction? "I LOVE your chicken purse. Oh my God! That is the best!" Not only did the employees genuinely gush about how much they LOVED my purse, but so did the customers. (Apparently, the head employee had designed animal purses at fashion school...which were shot down.) They even asked, "Where did you get it??" I'm looking forward to "round 2" next weekend. P.S. Love. This. Bag

review_header: For the Country Girl at Heart
review_text: I bought this hilarious birthday gift for my mom who's a fan of collecting chickens, roosters, and everything that's country related. Whens she opened the present, she had a huge smile on her face and everyone around her was laughing. My mom brought her purse to work and she said everyone loved it! The purse is definitely a conversation starter and everyone wants to feel it to see if it's actually made out of rubber. The only negative thing I have to say about this purse is the zipper. The zipper is fine but it is a tad bit small for the portion of the purse. You can definitely fit a lot of things inside: a wallet, phone, keys, tampons, and other items. I highly recommend this purse for the country girl at heart!

product_name: rubber chicken purse - the "hen bag" handbag
review_text: What can you say about a rubber-chicken purse that isn't good? Nothing! I mean, IT'S A RUBBER CHICKEN PURSE! It's adorable, it's a conversation piece, everyone wants to know where you got it, and it's FUN! LOLZ!

product_name: rubber chicken purse - the "hen bag" handbag

review_text: This is the third Chicken purse I have purchased for my mother. She loves them, just wishes the zipper was a bit longer.

product_name: rubber chicken purse - the "hen bag" handbag

product_name: rubber chicken purse - the "hen bag" handbag
review_text: It's a purse that's also a rubber chicken. What's not to love? Seriously, it's just the funniest darn thing ever and looking at it makes me smile. I also get comments...lots and lots of comments. Many, many women have asked me where I got it in the two months I've been carrying it. Some ask me to wait while they run and get a friend to look at it. I've had a lady just tentatively reach out a finger and poke it at church, without saying a word. LOL. In fact, I've also had a number of men comment on the awesomeness that is the chicken purse. Okay...Pro's: Roomy. Very roomy! You can fit a lot of stuff in this bag. It seems to be very well constructed. The materials are, obviously, easy to clean and if you squish it, it bounces right back. Finally - IT'S A FREAKING RUBBER CHICKEN PURSE! Con's: Yes, amazing chicken purse or not, there are a couple of cons. The single biggest one is the opening zipper is kind of small and because of that it's hard to find things in. You do a lot of feeling around for what you want. I wish the little pocket on the side had a zipper. It's kind of worthless without it. The handles aren't sewn shut so the rubber hose thing that makes them round tends to try to slide out; you see it right away and slide it back, but still. But in the end, I love her. Yes, she's a her. She's a chicken, not a rooster. All I need now is an egg-shaped wallet.

product_name: rubber chicken purse - the "hen bag" handbag

I find it hard to get things in or out of it. My mom is going to use it for decoration rather than as a purse. I bought the rubber fish one for myself and it has the same problem. But who cares, it's a fun thing to have when you feel like being silly and don't need to get things in and out of your purse often. I think the quality is good and the chicken has a very condescending expression, which I appreciate :)

product_name: rubber chicken purse - the "hen bag" handbag
review_text: I love my chicken purse. I don't want everyone to have one because mine is very special. I live in a small, rural town and have caused quite a stir. The only thing I don't like about it is that the zipper opening is a bit small but I have solved that issue by putting my belongings in a small make-up bag. Lots of space for wallet, checkbook, camera, calendar, keys. It's fantastic. I love the whimsy of it all. If you have a whimsical bone in your body (or an ironic one) I suggest that you get this purse. (They also come in brown but online it looks less striking as a chicken. The details are not as clear.) This purse is excellent psychotherapy because I laugh every time I see it, I HAVE to laugh and put things in perspective.

product_name: rubber chicken purse - the "hen bag" handbag
review_header: Fun and totally usable as an every day bag
review_text: The outside dimensions are about the size of a small bowling ball. The outside is a rubbery substance but the lining and bottom is some kind of thin waterproof cloth. There is one small interior pocket to separate out some small items like a wallet or keys. Overall the bag is robust enough for everyday use. It seems to make people happy to see it and attracts many comments. The size of the zip is as shown in the picture and is big enough to accommodate a paperback book or similar sized objects. I do not find it to be a problem.

product_name: rubber chicken purse - the "hen bag" handbag
review_text: I love this bag so much! One of the cutest purses I've ever bought. At first it was a little lumpy from being in a little box, but after shoving all of my junk into it, my chicken shaped up nicely. I've had it for a month and I'm still in love with it. There is a PVC plastic smell to the bag but DUH its brand new!!! It's not overpowering or gross in any way. It doesn't stink up your stuff either. If you don't want to smell it, don't stick your face inside of your bag. The zipper is quite short but I don't have any problems putting my stuff inside. I can get DVDs, CDs, my tablet, folded clothes, and my long wallet through the zipper so absolutely NO COMPLAINTS!!! You must buy this bag!

product_name: rubber chicken purse - the "hen bag" handbag
review_text: I purchased this for my mother for mother's day. She absolutely loves it. My mom is very fun and social, so when she gets in a fun and funky mood, I can definitely see her wearing this purse out about town. She laughed out load when she opened her chicken purse gift. She loves things that make her smile and giggle (who doesn't), so this was a perfect, fun gift for her. The zipper opening on top is small, as others have said, but not so small that you can't put belongings in. The purse cavern is large and can hold quite a bit, I imagine. The small opening could be annoying, but not to the point of not wearing the purse. It's still a 5 star item for sure.

product_name: rubber chicken purse - the "hen bag" handbag
review_header: I can't go back to a regular purse! So addictive to carry!
review_text: This is perhaps the best purse I have ever owned! I recommend it for anyone who has a sense of humor or wants to draw a little attention while out in public. But be prepared for chuckles and people constantly asking you were you got it from. My chicken purse who I have named Ms. Nugget goes everywhere with me and I find it difficult now to go back to a regular purse. I was surprised that the purse is actually a little bit bigger then I expected. As stated before by other people the zipper is a little too small and sometimes you have to work to get things in or out. But that is the only complaint I could find with this purse. It is made of rubber but I did not notice any kind of rubber smell. Because it is made of rubber I would not put anything sharp in it. I like the fact that it is made from rubber because I have been caught in many rainstorms this spring and the rain drops just bounce right off it. The inside is made from a silky type material and it has one pocket which is handy. The red handles are comfortable and are made from some kind of sturdy wire. The purse over all is deep and can fit many things. It is also easy to wipe clean. I have to say I am very addicted to this purse and carry it where ever I go.

product_name: rubber chicken purse - the "hen bag" handbag
review_text: Excellent - its the 2nd time I've bought this purse for my daughter - once was about 10 years ago - she loves it and gets tons of compliments on it. It arrived in 2 days!!!! Only drawback is the small open at the top of the bag - but I understand why it might need to be.

product_name: rubber chicken purse - the "hen bag" handbag
review_text: I'm a chicken nut, so when I recieved this bsg as an Xmas gift I was thrilled. Carried it for a long time and got a ton of compliments on it. It has held up well, even with extended use.

product_name: rubber chicken purse - the "hen bag" handbag
review_text: It's very cute. The opening is too small only if your hands aren't small. My hands are average sized for a woman, and it was difficult to remove my wallet from this purse. I would keep that in mind before ordering it. I wanted to keep it, but my family was embarrassed to be seen with me and this purse. They were mean about it. This is something else you might want to consider before purchasing it. Will your friends or relatives give you hell over a chicken purse? Can you stand their mean jibes?

product_name: rubber chicken purse - the "hen bag" handbag
review_header: Love this bag, wish it lasted longer :(
review_text: I thought this bag was amazing! It was so cute and I got so many compliments on it. It also shipped very quickly and was packed nicely. Though after a few months of carrying it the seam around the bottom started coming apart and then one of the handles actually ripped off :( Very sad because I loved it, but I don't know if I would buy another one knowing it won't last too long. Maybe I just got a defective one, I would still recommend getting it at least once, it was a lot of fun while it lasted.

product_name: rubber chicken purse - the "hen bag" handbag
review_text: This is a eye catching fun loving item lots of fun to watch people when they see it some want to take there picture with it. JB

product_name: rubber chicken purse - the "hen bag" handbag
review_text: You get exactly what is pictured. The texture is like one of those rubber chickens from a cheesy comedy show. Holds it's shape nice too.

product_name: rubber chicken purse - the "hen bag" handbag
review_text: Love this purse. The only downfall about it is the opening to get into it is so small. You can barley get your hand inside it let alone see inside it. You better know what you put in it cause its hard too see inside. Other than that its awesome,

product_name: rubber chicken purse - the "hen bag" handbag
review_text: We raise chickens and when I saw an acquaintance with a purse like this, I just had to get my own! This purse is always a conversation starter at the check out or in a restaurant. Actually, almost everywhere I go, someone comments on my "chicken". More times than not, they think she's pretty awesome! We took a recent vacation and I made sure to take pictures of it at certain locations. I ended up naming it "Chicken" instead of "My Purse". It is also very durable and waterproof. The only downside is the opening and the inside, The opening is rather small but the inside is huge. I do a lot of blind searching for things. I have started caring small zip pouches in it to separate my items. It would be better if there were a couple of zip pockets on the sides on the inside. Other than that.. Chicken is pretty cool!

review_text: Initially this was an impulse buy that I held off on for a few hours after I had seen a co-worker from another unit carrying this proudly on her arm. product_name: rubber chicken purse - the "hen bag" handbag
review_text: my mom collects roosters and chickens and it was very cute addition to her collection and if she uses it I doubt very highly anyone could steal her purse if she used it

product_name: rubber chicken purse - the "hen bag" handbag
review_text: What can I say? I got this as a gift and absolutely love it. This is the *ultimate* purse! I had already read other reviews, so I was aware that the zipper compartment was small, so that didn't surprise me. It will take some getting used to, though, so if you're planning on getting this purse, be prepared for a small adjustment period as you get used to carefully guiding things through a small opening. That said, I have a very large wallet, and it fits inside. Think of it as a bonus - nobody is ever just going to reach into your purse and snatch something out. You'll *know* if they try, and they won't be able to do it quickly. Your chicken will protect your goodies. The purse can hold quite a bit. It's a fat little thing with one little side pocket inside. When I used it the other day I put this in it: - a full size wallet - some paperwork - a nail care case - an electronic cigarette case about the size of my full size wallet - lots of pens and pencils - a knife - a sewing kit - a comb and brush - some safety pins - some scissors - a 16 oz. bottle of soda - my cell phone - two small packages of candy - my keys - my medicine - a charging cord for the e-cig - women's personal products - a small credit card pouch - reading glasses in a plastic case - a roll of tape And although the little chicken was full, there was room for more. It's also water-proof, which can be quite handy where I live. The only way you could improve this thing would be to make it cluck when you squeeze the beak.

product_name: rubber chicken purse - the "hen bag" handbag
review_text: .I get compliments on this purse daily, and it does hold everything. I wish the zipper opening was larger, but otherwise, I love it. The rubber smell eventually became a non-issue and was much less potent.

product_name: rubber chicken purse - the "hen bag" handbag
review_text: I had my eye on this for awhile, so my husband just said get it if you want it! So I did. I love it!

I stuffed mine full of packing material so that it will keep its shape between uses. As a backyard chicken owner, this is so appropriate and would make a great gift for any chicken loving gal.

product_name: rubber chicken purse - the "hen bag" handbag
review_text: I got this bag as a birthday present from a friend of mine. At first I wasn't sure where I was going to use it, but I ended up taking it to a concert in New York where it certainly attracted a lot of attention!

product_name: rubber chicken purse - the "hen bag" handbag
review_text: I saw this chicken purse on someone else's blog and I HAD to have it! I am actually a poultry owner, but I think this is such a fun purse even for the non-chicken owner! This purse is really well made. The rubber is thick, and it has a liner with a pocket inside. This is a much bigger purse than I was expecting. I'm not sure what I was expecting, actually, but you can really fit a LOT in this purse. I have gotten giggles and lots of great compliments on this purse. Everyone asks me where I got it and asks to touch it to see if it is REALLY rubber. (yes, it is) A very fun conversation piece, I have worn it everywhere from church, a girls night out, to just every day shopping. I'm surprised how many people love it, because I just got it for myself! The handles are a nylon webbing with a plastic form in them to hold their shape. They are really comfortable and I have no issues with the handles. I've had this purse about a month now and it's held up really well, especially since I've been using it every day since I got it. The great thing is, if it gets dirty, it would be easy to wipe down. ;)

product_name: rubber chicken purse - the "hen bag" handbag
review_text: It is just TOO cute!! I saw it in specialty catalogs for a much higher cost. I am thrilled with this bag. I can even carry make up, my lunch and stuff for the gym without worry. It is made of durable, easily cleanable material

product_name: rubber chicken purse - the "hen bag" handbag
review_text: This bag is perfect for me. I need a waterproof bag for necessary supplies. Also it is so cute, i love the chicken

product_name: rubber chicken purse - the "hen bag" handbag
review_text: I've had my Henbag for over two years and I get compliments every time I carry it. Since it's a rubber chicken I always use it when it's raining. She keeps everything dry. I've ordered six of them over the years for friends who have admired it or if they happen to have chickens. I've even sent three of them to London for a friend that gives them as presents. A real conversation piece!

product_name: rubber chicken purse - the "hen bag" handbag
review_text: Purse arrived in good time, packed well, no problems. I stuffed it with plastic bags for a few days to press out a wrinkle, worked fine. Have had lots of fun with Scarlett Wattles :) Even made her a page on Facebook! Thanks for the smiles.

product_name: rubber chicken purse - the "hen bag" handbag
review_header: I am buying my third hen bag.
review_text: This is true... I have literally worn out two other hen bags and decided that I need a new one. I switched to a black satchel and it is SO BORING. People love the hen bag all around the world. I took it to London, France, and Spain...everywhere I went, people were thrilled. It really is a conversation starter and broke down cultural barriers like no amount of well-meaning language butchering could. Anywhere I go, whether it's starbucks or a dive bar, people love the chicken. I decided that since everyone was going to be so nice about it, I would get little gifts to hand out to people who found it amusing, which is why I got the Mini Chickens: [...] They sell them by the gross, and I did not foresee getting through a gross of itty bitty chickens, but people love them. Kids, adults, men, women... everyone loves them. I receive photos from all measure of situations and geographies featuring my chickens having margaritas, sunning themselves, supporting mini gnomes, etc. I think of this bag as a lifestyle. There is one seriously bad thing about this bag, which is the zipper at the top. It's so fricken small. It takes a lot of work to get anything at all out of the top. Digging for makeup is practically impossible. It's just an unfortunate function of the physiology of the rubber chicken style, but it still is a pain in the butt. However, at $22, you can not get a better life improvement tool. I truly believe that. Combine it with a taco coin purse, since I hear the matching rubber chicken coin purse sucks.

product_name: rubber chicken purse - the "hen bag" handbag
review_text: x was wanting a COACH for her b-day. i thought about if for a few days and went to look up fake handbags this is what google gave me.. so i bought it. put it in a COACH bag and gave it to her..

product_name: rubber chicken purse - the "hen bag" handbag
review_text: This Chicken Purse or "Henbag" is just adorable! This is a must for any "Chick" that loves chickens! It is a real conversation piece and just fun to use. I would highly recommend this for anyone who has a good sense of humor and likes to have fun! Rubber Chicken Hen Tote Bag Handbag Purse Pocketbook "Henbag"

product_name: rubber chicken purse - the "hen bag" handbag
review_text: This a a fun purse. As another reviewer wrote, the opening is really too small. But if you're careful about what you have in the bag and don't need something in a hurry, it works out okay.

product_name: rubber chicken purse - the "hen bag" handbag
review_text: I have Prime so it arrived in 2 days. Opened it up and there was my Chicken Purse! Awesome! It's squishy rubber like a rubber chicken but it's a cute hen. The colors are clean and mellow and the bag is lined with pale yellow nylon and it has a pocket. It measures about 10 inches across the bottom and about the same at the top but the top is curved. It's about 7-8 inches tall. A good medium size bag. The zipper opening is only six inches which seems ok but when you actually open it you're only getting about a 4 inch hole. But I knew that from reading reviews. I couldn't get my wallet in but it's a big wallet and that's ok because I rarely carry it anyway. I have my phone, ID case, keys, mirror, some makeup, glasses, water, and there's lots more room. I love it! Everyone loves it! My daughters were shocked! They couldn't believe I was carrying a chicken purse. It's so cheery. As for the smell, it smelled like rubber toys, not a terrible rubber smell but more like a toy store. It is just the thing if you need to cheer yourself up!

product_name: rubber chicken purse - the "hen bag" handbag
review_text: it really looks vividly.And it's useful,too. My little baby girl loves it. It's my first time to buy thing from amazon (US). Good experience:)

product_name: rubber chicken purse - the "hen bag" handbag
review_text: A handbag not everyone is going to have! Tacky yet classy. It was bought as a gift for my best friend who collects rubbed chickens.

product_name: rubber chicken purse - the "hen bag" handbag
review_text: This purse made me laugh out loud when I saw it, and it makes me smile every time I look at it! It is a great quality and will be very easy to keep clean. I love how large the bottom of the purse is, as it keeps its shape no matter how little I am keeping in it. So far, it has not been uncomfortable to carry or had any cons except for the small zipper- it is good quality, but the opening is narrow. I get so many comments on this purse and people seem to love it almost as much as I do.

product_name: rubber chicken purse - the "hen bag" handbag
review_text: Recently I was asked out on a date with an unfortunate looking guy who has had a crush on me forever. I didn't know how to let him down so on the date i carried this purse, it was causing so much attention, every one pointed and laughed. He was so embarrassed to be seen with me. It worked! Now when I want my friends to avoid me or I desperately need attention, i just carry this around. Definitely a must have!!

product_name: rubber chicken purse - the "hen bag" handbag
review_text: I received this purse as a Christmas gift from my loving husband a couple years ago. He did not buy it from Amazon. However, it randomly it showed up in Amazon's Best Sellers list today. I will be reviewing the purse, not Amazon's awesome service. The purse is pretty great. It holds up well, easy to clean (rubber), and roomy. I may not have bought this for myself because of the following reasons, which are also why I gave the purse 4 stars. -I like a little smaller purse, especially with short handles. -I prefer handles I can put on my shoulder. -The opening, as mentioned in almost every other review, is small. I do enjoy carrying Billina around. She certainly turns heads! When my husband wrapped the purse for Christmas, he cleverly filled it with plastic Easter eggs. This was very fun! I use one of those eggs as a change purse! As I mentioned in a comment, I also like to set my ringtone to some sort of chicken noise. It just seems like the right thing to do. All-in-all I recommend this purse if you are someone who likes to make a statement with accessories.

product_name: rubber chicken purse - the "hen bag" handbag
review_text: My lunch group is now called CHICKS WHO LUNCH. Fun way to enjoy the purses. We take them to our monthly lunches! We get lots of attention. Love them!

product_name: rubber chicken purse - the "hen bag" handbag
review_text: The first time I saw this bag I knew I had to have it. It's absolutely adorable, hilarious, and quite a conversation starter! Everywhere I go people stare, point, grin, laugh, and ask me all about it. It's a good thing! Gets me out of my shell and yes, I get a chance to plug backyard chickens into everyone's minds as a fun possibility, as I really love my backyard flock! This purse is durable, lightweight, holds a TON (though the zipper opening is small and I sometimes have a hard time fitting things in), and is easy to clean. I did notice a rubber smell but it has dissipated in the last few weeks of using the bag. Love it and recommend it to anyone who needs something to brighten their day and others'!

product_name: rubber chicken purse - the "hen bag" handbag
review_text: My wife saw this purse and fell in love with it. At first, I thought that it was just a novelty purse, but I was really surprised at its functionality as well! It seems it's water-repellant and seem to be latex-free (I think it's a soft vinyl though I'm not certain), which is great since my wife's allergic. As much as my wife packs into a purse, this one seems durable. Awesome bang for the buck.

product_name: rubber chicken purse - the "hen bag" handbag
review_text: I have pet chickens and my husband bought this purse for me a couple of years and I love it and carry it most of the time. It is very durable. When mine gets a little grungy looking, I just throw it in in the washer with the towels and it comes out just like new. The only thing is, that over the years the inside pocket, which are made out of that thin fabric, has ripped. This purse is NOT for a person that wants to blend into the crowd. Almost everyday some one comments on it. I have people chase me down to ask about it. People have even stopped and asked to have their picture taken with it. It is definitely a conversation starter.

product_name: rubber chicken purse - the "hen bag" handbag
review_text: Love my new chicken purse. If it matters to anyone...I really think it is vinyl NOT rubber. This might matter if you had latex allergies. Also...vinyl is more durable.

product_name: rubber chicken purse - the "hen bag" handbag
review_text: The first time I saw this bag, I was instantly fascinated with it. Browsing Amazon Handbags for something "different" and "quirky" I came across this. I was drawn to it immediately, but I didn't make the jump to buy it. Instead I waited. I contemplated it. It was indeed eye catching, but wasn't too much? I mulled it over in my head for about two weeks, until i finally decided, for 20 bucks (no pun intended)? It was worth the risk, so I went ahead and made the purchase, and I am SO glad I did! This bag is AWESOME! It is truly unique. Everywhere I take it, It catches glimpses, and compliments. This bag is DEFINITELY not for one who takes themselves too seriously. For me, it fits my personality perfectly. The only thing negative I have to say is, The zipper is a little on the short side. It makes it hard to see into the bag and reach in. Definitely not as convenient, but its novelty charm definitely makes up for it in my mind. I'd say if your into whimsy, this is your bag!

product_name: rubber chicken purse - the "hen bag" handbag
review_text: My brother gave this to my daughter as an Easter gift and I "borrowed" it for a night. Never had so many compliments and giggles over a purse in my life! It's so funny! Yes, the opening is small, but it's so worth it!

product_name: rubber chicken purse - the "hen bag" handbag
review_text: I have had this chicken purse in my wish list forever, and the UPS truck shows up , I said to myself, I have not ordered anything. To my surprise it was the chicken purse!!! My sweet oldest daughter bought it for me for Mothers Day. I called to thank her, and we started picking out names for her. We settled on the name Fannie Lou, because we were sure Henny Penny had already been taken. We had the best time thinking of all the things we could do with this purse, like making a nest for her in the front seat, with fake eggs!!! We were just having fun, so this chicken purse will make you laugh. It does have a strong rubber smell to it, but who cares, it will go away a some point. The opening is 7" wide big enough to get most things inside. Once inside it is huge, I got a lot of stuff in mine. First trip out was to the grocery store, it was priceless!!! In the milk/egg aisle, I am looking at eggs (honest) 2 little girls with their mom staring at my chicken purse, looking at me like why are you buying eggs lady? Their mom wanted to know where I got that purse, either everyone in the store were enjoying Fannie Lou or thinking, look at that crazy lady with that chicken purse. I don't care, if it makes one person smile then it is worth it. Fannie Lou will be with me at the Flea Market, and the Farmers Market, and the grocery store especially when I need eggs.

product_name: rubber chicken purse - the "hen bag" handbag
review_text: I bought this rubber chicken purse for a special person's Birthday. I'm sure she'll enjoy it and get a lot of comments when she carries it. It's too cute for words.

product_name: rubber chicken purse - the "hen bag" handbag
review_header: Very Cute, But Opening Is Too Small
review_text: It's super cute and good sized without being overly large. I'll certainly be able to fit all my stuff in it. The only possible problem I foresee is getting it back out. As others have mentioned, the opening at the top of the purse is small. If it were just an inch bigger that would've been helpful. A lot of shaking and digging about to find what I'm looking for is in my future. That being said, I'm going to have fun wearing it out. I wear simple, black clothing 99% of the time and the purse is really going to pop. It'll be a conversation starter for sure.

product_name: rubber chicken purse - the "hen bag" handbag
review_text: I was looking for purses and stumbled upon this gem. It called out to me. I had to get it. Everything everyone said is true - it has a strong rubber smell and a very small opening. I love it, though. I was actually looking for a larger purse for my eReader. It barely fits in the opening - it is a challenge - but then it lays perfectly on the bottom. I doubt I will use it regularly, though, as cavernous purses with no pockets irritate me. It is just a matter of time before Clucky is bloated with 6-month old receipts. I do think it is educational as I had a conversation with a complete stranger on the differences between hens and chickens. lol. Edit: I have already moved onto another purse. And having a wider opening was so nice!

product_name: rubber chicken purse - the "hen bag" handbag
review_text: Awesome funky chicken purse! Well made and very roomy. Must have for anyone who loves anything Chicken. In my mind this is a piece of folk art. A rubber one, but folk art nonetheless!

product_name: rubber chicken purse - the "hen bag" handbag
review_text: This purse is adorable, but small. The straps are small and I cant put it around my arm so I have to leave it in the cart while shopping. It is soooo cute though.

product_name: rubber chicken purse - the "hen bag" handbag
review_text: I was thrilled when my rubber chicken purse finally came! I get people stopping me in public and get the same two questions...1. ''Is that a chicken purse???'' and 2. ''Where did you get that????!!'' Even the grandaughters like it and ask if they can carry my purse just to be carrying a chicken!! LOL!! A lot of fun!!

product_name: rubber chicken purse - the "hen bag" handbag
review_text: Fun: Cute & good for starting conversations Impractical: Opening to purse is rather small, making it difficult to insert & remove items. Has only one interior pocket that is difficult to see into. After two weeks the burnt rubber smell is still pretty strong (especially if it is in the sun). Revised review 1 year later. Ok, I confess, I just bought my second chicken purse so I must increase my rating to 5 stars. The smell does eventually go away completely, but it took about 4-6weeks. Yes, it is impractical in all of the ways I describe above. I solved the problem of not being able to find my cell phone in this purse by attaching a Nintendo game-boy case to the handle for the purpose of keeping my phone in an easily accessible spot. The thing I love about this purse, I'm embarrassed to admit, is all of the attention it brings. I've had multiple people stop me to take pictures of my purse. I get comments almost every day when I use this purse. People recognize me by my purse now; it has become a part of my identity. Its a fun conversation starter as well. So even though it isn't the most practical thing in the world, a lot of fun to use as well as being well made.

product_name: rubber chicken purse - the "hen bag" handbag
review_text: I love this purse so much! Everyone comments on it and it is JUST what it appears in the picture. It is durable and roomy. I would tell anyone that this product line is great and that they deliver what they advertise.

product_name: rubber chicken purse - the "hen bag" handbag
review_text: i got my hen bag today i let out a little scream i was so excited its awsome im going to take tons of pictures with it the deatail is so awsome every handbag collecter needs one ty paula

product_name: rubber chicken purse - the "hen bag" handbag
review_text: ...who doesn't need a rubber chicken purse. That's what I thought, you immediately thought of 3 people to get this for. Pros: Rubber. Chicken. Purse. Roomy, as one might expect from a chicken. Sits upright ever so adorably. Excellent construction. Cons: Zippered opening at top is a little small. Another inch would have been nice.

product_name: rubber chicken purse - the "hen bag" handbag
review_text: LOVE IT, LOVE IT, LOVE IT!!!! Not much else to say. This is a fabulous little attention getting accessory. If you are up for a bit of gawking, commentary from strangers (both good and bad), with a sprinkling of slightly measured distaste from your not-so-fashion-forward or adventurous husband (he's named it Gertrude!!!), get this bag.

product_name: rubber chicken purse - the "hen bag" handbag
review_text: This is a unique bag which is good to give as gifts. I recommend this to friends who would like to buy some gifts for less than $30.

product_name: rubber chicken purse - the "hen bag" handbag
review_header: A Fashion Statement, NOT a Toy!
review_text: I love my chicken purse! I am a 53 year-old woman, and I love the whimsy this accessory has added to my life... The handles and the body of the purse are durable, but I am unsure how the bottom of the purse will hold up. It is nicely lined with a shiny material and has a small pocket on the inside. The zipper on the top of the purse is only 6" long, which is on the short side, but if it were any longer, would compromise the purse's appearance. Well worth the price... I would definitely recommend this purse to anyone who is brave enough to carry it!

product_name: rubber chicken purse - the "hen bag" handbag
review_text: I ordered this really for myself. But I get so many people who want one! Just the other day I was at the mall and a woman asked if she could take a picture of my purse because her mom had the same one and was amazed to see another! Little Kira constantly ask me if they can touch my purse, the parents always tell them not to be rude but I don't mind it looks like a kids toy so why wouldn't I let kids see it? Great buy!

product_name: rubber chicken purse - the "hen bag" handbag
review_text: This bag is just adorable. It is exactly as pictured and as other reviewers have shared. The bag is BIG, but I am not sure how durable it is or how much weight it will hold. Also, as others noted, the opening is pretty small. Basically, you can stuff your hand holding a small wallet in the opening. Despite the lack of practicality, this bag makes me laugh and I cannot wait to carry it out. At least at a bar if I spill something on my bag, it will wipe right off! If you love chickens or chicken-related items, this is a keeper.

product_name: rubber chicken purse - the "hen bag" handbag
review_text: I love my chicken purse. I get comments about it everywhere I go. It always puts a smile on people's faces. At first the zipper opening seemed very small, and was hard to see into the purse, but I got used to it fast, and would recommend this purse to anyone who likes fun.

product_name: rubber chicken purse - the "hen bag" handbag
review_text: My adult girls gave me some Amazon gift cards for Mother's Day & this was the first thing I picked out for myself. I LOVE this purse!! I always get compliments on it, too. Now if only they'd make change purses to match...

product_name: rubber chicken purse - the "hen bag" handbag
review_text: I love this bag. I receive so many comments when going out with it. Truly a unique purse. Not sure how to clean the dirt off the rubber; daily use causes it to get dirty.

product_name: rubber chicken purse - the "hen bag" handbag
review_text: i love this purse! it was bigger and sturdier than i expected! everwhere i go people look at it and comment on it. the ONLY thing i hate is the super narrow opening and the super short handles. it isn't enough to keep me from using it because A LOT fits inside of it!

product_name: rubber chicken purse - the "hen bag" handbag
review_text: I have just ordered my second chicken purse! My first one I've had for 2 years before having to retire her. This purse is so much fun if your an out-going people kinda person! Everywhere I go people have to show their friends, take a picture of it and/or touch it. I even have a clucking chicken ringtone on my phone and couldn't resist naming my "girls." I find Delores and Agnes quite popular~ hahaha. The one draw back I have is that, it's hard to find anything in this cavernous purse. The zipper opening is so small that I've considered extending the opening down the "bum" w/ velcro. Not to be weird or gross but for convenience purposes. After some time the rubber will start to crack all over, especially around the handles from stretching the opening to dig for stuff. Obviously though, its worth the it in the end!

product_name: rubber chicken purse - the "hen bag" handbag
review_text: I saw this Chicken Handbag on Martha Stewart's website and I fell in love! It makes heads turn, most important it makes people smile. The quality is very good and has a lot of space.

product_name: rubber chicken purse - the "hen bag" handbag
review_text: this is such a cool accesory out of the ordinary, it has a funny smell but this is because the purse is made of rubber and the opening is really small but the bag itself is of a good size.

product_name: rubber chicken purse - the "hen bag" handbag
review_text: People are used to me having an awesome purse and this one was a BIG HIT....small opening, deep purse, and very durable......GET ONE!

product_name: rubber chicken purse - the "hen bag" handbag
review_text: There is nothing bad to say about a rubber chicken purse. It is genius. And, because it is made of rubber, it wipes off easily if you spill your spaghetti-os... LOL SOOOO cute!

product_name: rubber chicken purse - the "hen bag" handbag
review_text: I bought this fo my Mom for Christmas. It was her favorite gift and she says that she has never had so many compliments on her apparel!!! She is 86 and resides in an assisted living facility and is the envy of all the ladies with her new purse. Highly recommend this, it is well made, roomy and definitely unique. Just the thing for someone who already has everything!!

product_name: rubber chicken purse - the "hen bag" handbag
review_text: I received this purse as a gift for my birthday. It was on my wish list, so I wasn't overly surprised, but still very happy! The awesome Pros of the chicken purse: *Not highly susceptible to purse thieves (it's a bit flashy) *Nice size for carrying objects (ex. water bottles) inside *Conversation starter *Matches well with most wardrobes (surprisingly!) *Feels very durable- strong handles, nice and detailed rubber *Has a handy inside pocket for keys or cellphone *Lined with silk-like material and bottom of purse is reinforced *Fits over the forearm (even with a bulky winter coat on!) for those chilly days when hands must be in pockets The minimal Cons of the Chicken Purse: *Might attract more attention than wanted *The zipper closer IS a bit shorter than expected and can be a hassle when putting objects (like microwave-ready soup containers) inside, but for general (normal?) use it isn't too much or an issue *Has an odd rubber smell that isn't a big deal and is only noticeable when sticking your nose in the bag. (and will eventually fade, I think). So far, it hasn't made any items inside the bag smell, but when I added a pack of minty gum inside, the two smells mixed and are fairly unlikable. *Feels durable, but I am concerned about sharp objects possibly stabbing through the rubber (somehow??) Overall, I am thrilled I received this as a birthday present. I did have it on my wish list. A great gift idea for someone who loves chickens (not me) or doesn't enjoy the conventional purse styles (defiantly me!) I almost wish there was a button inside the comb of the chicken that would produce a "clucking" noise when pressed. But, maybe that's going too far. Haha.

product_name: rubber chicken purse - the "hen bag" handbag
review_header: I love my little chicken purse
review_text: I bought this purse because it made me laugh and I couldn't stop smiling when I saw it. It's had the same effect on everyone around me every time I've used it. Everyone smiles and thinks it's just the greatest bag ever. I do wish that the handles were longer....it is an oversight that requires you to hold it by its handles. I can just barely slip it over my shoulder, but it's not so comfortable and an extra 2" on the handles would solve the problem. It really does look best over your shoulder because it looks like you're carrying a chicken under your arm. It's a riot! People at work actually ask me when I'm going to bring my chicken purse again but they have to wait until summertime. As for cost, a little expensive and frivolous for something plastic, but I've had so much fun with it, that it's been totally worth it.

product_name: rubber chicken purse - the "hen bag" handbag
review_header: I am using this a purse, not a toy!
review_text: I use this as a purse. I get a few strange looks when I take it into a store. I believe the hype about expensive handbags has gotten out of hand and I bought it to make fun of the women I work with, who spend literally hundreds of dollars on purses. Ridiculous!!!!! I always tell them..don't you wish you had one just like it!

product_name: rubber chicken purse - the "hen bag" handbag
review_text: "This is a great gag gift. the zipper was a little short and is not as practical as I had hoped."

product_name: rubber chicken purse - the "hen bag" handbag
review_text: This is a great purse. I bought it as a gift and like it a lot

product_name: rubber chicken purse - the "hen bag" handbag
review_text: Love it, love it. Get comments every time I'm out with it. It makes people (& myself) smile or laugh.

product_name: rubber chicken purse - the "hen bag" handbag
review_text: I picked up this cute little number for my friend Brian D. to complete his camping ensemble. He was complaining that he had no where to store his lip gloss, iPod, Advil and other small items. Brian just got back from his camping trip with the Boy Scouts and Harley Davidson biker Club Weekend Jamboree, and said that his Chicken purse was the perfect accessory for the trip. He said it was the highlight of discussion and everyone loved it. Based on his comments, I would recommend the Chicken purse for anyone who wants to be the center of attention.

product_name: set of ten finger hands finger puppets
review_text: 8 light skin tone and 2 dark skin tone - are you KIDDING ME? No mention of mixed skin tones in product description and photo shows matching hands HOW HARD IS IT TO SORT THE HANDS BY COLOR EPIC FAIL

review_header: These are the cutest little things, but of the ...
review_text: These are the cutest little things, but of the ten eight were right handed and only two left. Of the right hands six were pink and two brown! Such a shame not to take the time and care to get it right.

product_name: set of ten finger hands finger puppets
review_text: You will get an uneven number of left and right-handed finger puppets. I received 9 left-handed puppets and 1 single right-handed puppet.

review_text: Fail. I was looking forward to getting 5 sets of left and right hands, but got 1 right and 9 left hands. Should've said in description that it was a random assortment. Can't even return or replace the product

review_text: Fun. But I got 7 left fingers out of 10, which is supposed to be 5-5 left vs. right.

product_name: set of ten finger hands finger puppets
review_header: Do not expect equal number of left and right hands.
review_text: They are definitely funny but unfortunately the left and right hands did not match up so my plan to give them as funny little gifts will not work since people would end up with pairs of left hands.. still funny to have but not as successful as if there were actual pairs instead of mostly left hands with a couple rights.

product_name: set of ten finger hands finger puppets
review_text: They worked fine but I also received uneven amount of left and right hands.

review_header: Ummm. Two of the hands are Mexican and the ...
review_text: Ummm. Two of the hands are Mexican and the remaining 8 are Caucasian. This item isn't eligible for return, so...I guess I'm stuck with a random assortment?? The photo showed ten matching hand finger puppets. That is not what i got. Boo.

product_name: set of ten finger hands finger puppets
review_text: Buyer beware! Item not as expected. Received 6 left hands and 4 right hands. 7 hands of one skin tone with 3 hands of a different skin tone. No return policy! Watch me get my money back! SCAM!!!

product_name: set of ten finger hands finger puppets
review_text: Really disappointed as I ordered two packs and received 20 right hands. I only ordered two packs because I thought I could piece together a full set since some people got left hands. Then even more disappointed to find out I can't return them. I guess someone's getting a bunch of finger hands as their white elephant gift, or I could just leave them around town in random places.

product_name: set of ten finger hands finger puppets
review_header: fun stocking stuffer but I got 2 brown hands instead ...
review_text: fun stocking stuffer but I got 2 brown hands instead of the last two white hands. not a big deal but kind of disappointed

product_name: set of ten finger hands finger puppets
review_text: 7 left hands and 3 right hands?!?! Not what I was hoping for.

product_name: set of ten finger hands finger puppets
review_header: Good quality but a little disappointed
review_text: They are very good quality and fit nicely on all my fingers but I’m a little disappointed that it came with 6 right hands and only 4 left

product_name: set of ten finger hands finger puppets
review_text: I got 6 right hands and 4 left hands. A good product other than that.

product_name: set of ten finger hands finger puppets
review_header: I had matching left and right hands but as a ...
review_text: I had matching left and right hands but as a previous review mentioned there was one brown hand in the mix. They should all be white or all be brown but not mixed. I plan to use them for counting in groups of five so it looks weird. The kids end up asking more about why is that hand brown and those white instead of concentrating on the point of the counting. Major distraction.

product_name: set of ten finger hands finger puppets
review_text: I was very excited for these, I had ordered a set of small hands for all of my friends for Christmas. Unfortunately I received three right hands and seven left hands so now I have to give two friends only left hands. :(

I'm right-handed, my physical comedy is right-handed, and I assumed there would be five of each. Only after I received THREE RIGHT HANDS did I decide to read the reviews. Boo. Makes no sense, really.

product_name: set of ten finger hands finger puppets
review_text: Ordered it the first time and got 5 Right hands and 5 Left hands, which was great. Ordered it again and the package had 8 Left hands and 2 Right hands.... that's BS....

review_text: It's not a "set" of ten finger hands. It's just ten finger hands. It's misleading to tell people in the reviews that you get 5 left and 5 right hands. Other than that, product is exactly what it is.

product_name: set of ten finger hands finger puppets
review_header: Didn't come in the same color
review_text: These arrived and rather than being 10 white hand finger puppets, there were only 8 white and 2 brown. This is not what is illustrated in the image. For that reason, I would expect to be sent another 2 that complete the set.

I don't know if the description was changed from when I ordered, but the current description says only right hands. It would be nice to have an equal number of left and right hands. I like having the thumbs match my thumbs. We take these everywhere and either get excitement and smiles out of people or get awkward and creeped out looks. I love the details with the veins and fingerprints though. They are a little tight on my fingers, but I think most people won't have this issue.

review_text: so when these arrived, there were a few small squares of blotter paper in the bottom of the box the hands arrived in. they were in a packet that said 'eat me' on the outside. being the daring type individual, and having read alice in wonderland, and sensing a need for an adventure, i ate them...all 20 of them. i then proceeded to affix the hand puppets to my fingers, as shown in the picture, and sat back to see what would happen, wiggling my fingers playfully. about 30 minutes later, life suddenly looked ike a scene from the marvel movie dr. strange, wherein stephen strange pretty much taunts the ancient one into throwing him into alternate realities. the walls were melting, everything became crystaline, shattered and dormammu popped up to offer me a can of spinach, telling me it's good for my musckles, and an infinite variety of other pieces of insanity from the abyss...i looked at my hands and the hands growing from my fingers were growing hands from their fingers, much like the attached picture, and it just wouldn't stop....this went on, with me unable to take my eyes from my hands, for several days. or at least it had to have been days, though it seemed at the time to be centuries, because i blinked and it suddenly all coalesced back to my living room, and me with puppets on my fingers. i took them off and looked at my cell phone, and it was tuesday night...i had begun all this on saturday morning. everything looked so...i don't know, normal, except that my cat had ears growing from her ears. that hasn't stopped yet. the world is a lot more fun now, i can say that. not for the weak of heart, mind, or spirit.

review_header: A set of 10 but hands, awesome gag toy!
review_text: Ordering this, you get 10 tiny hands — 5 right hands and 5 left hands. I've seen many reviews where they get an uneven number of right and left hands but that was not the case for me; I guess I was lucky. It seems these rubber hands are made by the company "MCPHEE". Considering these ARE rubber hands, they do get dirty quite easily and will require cleaning with soap. Color does not rub off! Still a funny gag toy! (The hands are really detailed by the way) In conclusion: BUY AT YOUR RISK: - because they might come in uneven numbers of right and left hands - the wrong hand color PROS: Hey, in the end, you still got 10 mini hands, so smile!

review_text: The Ten Finger Hands Puppets are amazing! My 17 young daughter ask me for them after a snapchat, and I said absolutely!! product_name: set of ten finger hands finger puppets
review_text: Having noticed that the listing stated "ten finger hands" but didn't specify left/right, along with reading several reviews that mentioned unequal pairing of left and right hands, I purchased two packs of ten hoping to make up one full set of tiny hands (5 left/5 right) to give as a present. The first package contained 10 x right hands (9 x Caucasian; 1 x POC). The second package contained 6 x left hands and 4 x right hands (of which 3 x Caucasian; 1 x POC). In total I have six full sets of tiny hands (containing a left AND a right), and eight standalone right hands. Loved the inclusion of POC hands (although they don't make a matching pair, just two right hands). The hands themselves are hilarious! They seem like good quality durable material, and have nice detail making them look more realistic. The holes are a good size for adults, but might be a bit big for younger kids. All in all, not disappointed and looking forward to the joy these tiny hands are bound to bring!

review_text: Spent the money on this after so much debate and research and REALLY wish I wouldn't have. Poor sound quality turned into virtually no sound for no reason. The headphone jack is definitely not meant for auxiliary (loud buzz & clicking) and the output didn't give me any additional volume. I wasn't traveling with this thing, so I have no idea why it would have suddenly decided to just stop making making sound. Frankly, I don't see the value in investing the time or or additional money into finding out. I can just help you. I have never purchased anything that went so badly so quickly in my life that was so expensive from such a reputable name. In my opinion you could do better buying anything else at all from any other other brand.

product_name: crosley cr8005a-tu cruiser portable 3-speed turntable, turquoise

product_name: crosley cr8005a-tu cruiser portable 3-speed turntable, turquoise
review_header: please do not waste your money and ruin your records
review_text: DO NOT BUY THIS!!!!!! I repeat, please do not waste your money and ruin your records. The Crosley portable turntables, not having an adjustable counterweight, have been proven time and again to apply too much pressure to your records. What does this mean? it means every time you play a record on this turntable the needle digs a deeper groove into the vinyl, wearing away at the sound quality. This will eat your records. Shell out a little more for an Audio Technica AT-LP120, amazing table for a low cost (if you want to actually preserve your records). one more time for the stubborn: DO NOT BUY THIS HORRIBLE PRODUCT

product_name: crosley cr8005a-tu cruiser portable 3-speed turntable, turquoise
review_header: I bought this record player because I LOVED the look of it and the fact that it ...
review_text: I bought this record player because I LOVED the look of it and the fact that it is small + portable. But that is where the good qualities end. The sound quality with this thing is horrible; it's very pitchy and "wobbles" the record so the sound goes in and out. Spend a little extra money and get something better. I actually bought my friend a "Victrola Nostalgic Aviator Wood 8-in-1 Bluetooth Turntable Entertainment Center" for christmas and am jealous I didn't just buy one for myself as well. It's only double the price but has WAY better sound quality. It also records onto CDs which is nice because it captures that static, record sound so that you can "listen to a record" anywhere.

product_name: crosley cr8005a-tu cruiser portable 3-speed turntable, turquoise
review_header: Won't play your Twenty One Pilots records
review_text: Literally buy anything else, every one of these has a fatal design flaw that makes playing modern records impossibe: the speakers are built into the device...the device that relies on picking up very specific vibrations to play the music...think about that. As the speakers vibrate, the needle vibrates and skips. This isn't so bad on old, thinner records from the 60s, 70s, and 80s, but newer, thicker records with better bass response will skip all over the place. So don't ever buy an all-in-one turntable, because they will all skip when playing new records. If you don't want to spend the money on a proper turntable, proper speakers, and a proper amp/receiver, then seriously reconsider whether vinyl is actually right for you, or if you are just following a trend. If you value convenience over the experience of listening to an entire album all the way through, then feel free to take advantage of the last 30 years of advancements in technology. Another FACT that you need to know is that NO, vinyl does not sound better than CDs. It doesn't sound "warmer" or more "true". Assuming perfect media conditions, then the sound quality is INDISCERNABLE by human ears. Any perception that vinyl sounds better or even different at all is entirely placebo. In double blinded studies no one has ever been able to tell the difference between CD, vinyl, and even cassette tape. So why do people think that vinyl sounds better? Why do they like vinyl if it doesn't sound any different? Well because many young people alive today have only ever experienced iTunes, mp3s and other compressed audio formats. All physical media will sound better than an mp3, becuase it hasn't been compressed (had certain frequencies and sounds removed to save disk space). As to why people would prefer vinyl even though it sounds the same, I think people are tired of not owning their music. You can buy songs piecemeal from iTunes, but you never own them. They still belong to Apple and you're just licensing it from them. They can take it away from you at any time. But if you buy an album on physical media, then it's yours. And if you're going to buy something physical, you might as well get the big one with the nice album art. If you want a nice automatic TT on a budget, go with an Audio Technica LP-60. You can even get one with USB out so you can run it through your computer if you're too cheap to buy speakers and an amp. Oh and stay away from bluetooth speakers because they compress the audio and you might as well be listening to mp3s at that point. Good luck, kids!

product_name: crosley cr8005a-tu cruiser portable 3-speed turntable, turquoise
review_text: As a record store you would think we would be THRILLED that people are buying record players. However, when it comes to these portable turntables, excitement couldn't be further from our minds. They are sleek and light but beyond style they fail miserably at their primary function: playing records. The main issue with these turntables is their lack of a counter-weight at the base of the tone arm. This weight is a vital component of any record player, as it set the correct force (grip if you will) on the record with the stylus. Without this weight you will have a stylus that skates across several of your records (180g records in particular). If you plan on playing Dynoflex records exclusively then you may be able to avoid any issues. Our recommendation: buy a record player with a counter-weight.
